title: `quarkus.otel.traces.exporter` and `quarkus.otel.traces.sampler` should be runtime config
body:
### Describe the bug

Currently, `quarkus.otel.traces.exporter` and `quarkus.otel.traces.sampler` configurations are build time.

They should be runtime in order to give a chance to SRE team to customize/update the otel exporter/sampler configuration.

### Expected behavior

`quarkus.otel.traces.exporter` and `quarkus.otel.traces.sampler` should be runtime config.

### Actual behavior

`quarkus.otel.traces.exporter` and `quarkus.otel.traces.sampler` are buildtime config.

### How to Reproduce?
